website_summaries.verdict: One of the most popular dog cameras. Offers the most features for interacting with your furry friend.
pros: Great for keeping track of your pets
A big bonus is that you can use whatever treats you'd like as long as they fit
The video feed offers clear picture quality and users can talk to and listen to their pets
cons: The camera angle can't be adjusted

customer_reviews.title: *New Premium Plan Charges for Basic Functions
customer_reviews.text: After less then a month of owning it, I get a notification that they will be charging for the “premium functions”. The only basic functions that I will still get are the live feed and the treat dispenser. Which arent the best video quality to begin with. But the person alert, barking alert, selfie alert, are now part of the premium package which they just announced they will be rolling out and charging Furbo customers for. I am returning my Furbo as I find it ridiculous to have to pay every month for the basic functions that the Furbo is supposed to offer.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Tapper

customer_reviews.title: terrible app and poor customer support- don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: The app never worked on my phone. I tried it on my iPad and it still never connected to the camera. I contacted the company numerous times and every response was the same one line "we're sorry we're really busy but we'll get to you soon," I eventually gave up and returned it because I was so angry at the huge waste of money. I was really sad about this not working. It looked nice and is a great idea but just didn't work at all. On a whim I bought a petcube bite camera and it is a million times better than the furbo! I had it up and running in 5 minutes and my dogs LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t connect - don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I use T-Mobile with iPhone 7 and I am on LTE usually. I can’t connect to Furbo most of the times. When it does connect, it takes about 20 min to do so. I love the idea and design of the product but the company really needs to do something about the connectivity. It sucks, especially for that price. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Yulia

customer_reviews.title: Twice as expensive and less features as something like the Amazon Cloud Cam
customer_reviews.text: What a total waste of money. Unlike, say the Amazon Cloud Cam, which can hear and speak just like the Furbo, the Furbo has no way of viewing from a web browser and no way of storing and viewing clips for free, motion detection, and costs twice as much! Oh, but it can throw treats... sometimes... it's jams most of the time and I am using one of the recommended brands. Overpriced, disappointing, and lacking some very basic features like viewing from a web browser! Unfortunately I am just outside the return period, just got the cloud cams, and now have a Furbo I will never use...
customer_reviews.author: John Connor

customer_reviews.title: it is great. Sadly
customer_reviews.text: I want this to work. when it works, it is great. Sadly, it often does not work and I am told over and over to reset the wifi or to unplug it and plug it in etc...same things every time. The latest update made it worse than ever. The app tells me that my dog is barking but then it will not connect, I can't see her or toss her a treat so basically I am completely frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I love Furbo! And once I can go back to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought Furbo because I was getting major surgery and knew I'd be in the hospital for awhile. Even though my baby's "daddy" would be home I couldn't let my baby think I left him. So in the hospital I was talk to him, see him and of course give him his "scooby snacks". I love Furbo! And once I can go back to work I'll be using it there! If you love your baby like I do...I highly recommend Furbo!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead Furbo - 40 days in
customer_reviews.text: 10 days after the return window closes, our treat dispenser dies. We followed the FAQ's on the Furbo site incase it was a jam, and no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter-Eventer-Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product, never even got through set up
customer_reviews.text: I can't fully express how terrible the Furbo is, because I never got beyond attempts to set it up. My wifi is fine, my bluetooth works with countless other gadgets; it's the Furbo. I got the product, tried 5 times to set it up (including all the FAQ recommended ways to re-start the machine, my phone, the bluetooth) and none of them worked. So I called and got a replacement. Same problems and never got past set-up. I am returning it now for a full refund. I am livid that I have wasted an entire week on technological mishaps when I needed to be training my new dog.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Berson

customer_reviews.title: Monthly subscriptions fee
customer_reviews.text: Had this about a year now. Worked great but now I need to pay an extra fee each month for pretty much everything. The only thing that comes with the basic is the barking alerts everything else comes with the premium package now. To have all these features for that long and have them taken away knowing that other camera offer the same camera features for free just doesn't make since.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Niccum

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product until they decided to charge for the basic functions as a monthly subscription service. I've had this for just a few months and now can't return. Strongly recommend not buying this camera and go with a different one. What a disappointment considering how expensive this was. It no longer notified me of any activities, doesn't record clips of my pet or people. All these things were previously included but now cost extra per month. Definitely feel like I got cheated out of $200 to purchase this. Unless you don't mind spending an extra $60 a year to fully use this $200 camera, get a different one!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Y.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Update: Furbo finally replaced the unit. And sent me some tiny packs of training treats that have so much garbage in them there is NO way I'd feed them to my dog. The replacement Furbo worked okay for about a month, then it quit tossing treats, then it quit completely. By then, it was too late for a refund from Amazon. Original review: It does not work. No amount of firmware updates, plugging and unplugging, reinstalling the app, or resetting my router can make it work. Worse, customer service is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Noneofyour

customer_reviews.title: Cool technology!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my lady friend who frets about leaving her little dog alone at home. She loves being alerted every time the little dude barks at passing delivery trucks and snow plows. She refuses to talk to little dude via the speaker because she doesn't want to "freak him out" but she does watch him wander around the living room from her iPhone. Setup is a breeze and there has been zero issues with this gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Les Paul

customer_reviews.title: Camera spies on you
customer_reviews.text: Recently, without asking, and without getting permission, the device turned on the Furbo Dog Nanny. This is typically a paid service, but they gave it to customers free for a week, again without asking or being granted permission. The Dog Nanny automatically records and stores video any time it sees a person. When I happened to open the application, I saw that the camera had 330 private videos it had taken of my stored in Furbo's cloud storage. The device immediately went in the trash. Looking into legal action now.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome furbo!
customer_reviews.text: After this recent software upgrade, our furbo has worked without issues. Great product! *side note- our furbo worked too well because our dog attacked it, while we were gone, and dragged around and chewed at it until he got the treats out. It doesn't look as new as it when we had received it 1 week prior, but still works!! He loves it, and so do we.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this... but
customer_reviews.text: I really tried hard to like this but I couldn't. It scared the heck out of my dog with the noise it makes before it throws the treat. I even tried to record my own voice but the quality wasn't good and it still scared the dog. I even kept it 2 feet about the floor and it would still shoot out at the dog sending her running.. too traumatic for a skittish dog. I also had problems keeping it connected to the wifi. There was always a 50/50 chance the app would work and connect.
customer_reviews.author: Linda E

customer_reviews.title: Basic feature now a yearly subscription
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disingenuous of a company to sell a product touting these wonderful features, then suddenly switch them off without notice and require a paid subscription. The item is basically useless without the subscription, at least at $200 a pop. Tossing treats and talking to your dog is a nice novelty feature. The best feature — motion sensor — has been disabled without a yearly subscription. If you want to change your business practices for future buyers, that’s one thing. To lure someone in then change the settings on the device after the fact is classic bait and switch. Crummy business practices, and I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Yazoo68

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I love paying $200 for something I have to pay to use. They took away all the good features and it's useless now if you don't pay for "Premium" for a product you already bought. Waste of money - I absolutely do not recommend to anyone. Spend $20 on a security camera that has free noise and motion detection, and actually records.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: We're loving this camera! We're using it to train ...
customer_reviews.text: We're loving this camera! We're using it to train our dog to be ok alone. He doesn't care at all about us leaving when the treats start coming out!
customer_reviews.author: katherinewilliams

customer_reviews.title: Actual Life Saver!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t typically write reviews but last week, Furbo actually saved my dogs life. My puppy was home and I had just gotten to work when I got a notification that she was active. When I looked at the camera, she had pulled a bag of treats from the top of the counter and it was over her head and she was stuck. I was able to keep her engaged with me by throwing treats at her as I sped home to help. If I didn’t have Furbo, I believe my pup would have suffocated in that bag. So thankful for this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally peace of mind..
customer_reviews.text: I was always concerned leaving my puppy home alone because he will cry a lot.. When I got Furbo, things got much better! Furbo sent me notifications to my phone when he was crying, so I would log on and talk to him right away. This changed everything!! My puppy knows I'm always there, so his separation anxiety is getting better. He cries less, and I feel much more relieved.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at how well it works!
customer_reviews.text: We have loved this Furbo so far. Just have one complaint about the privacy mode. Whenever I come back to the house the Furbo doesn't always turn off. I have to go into settings and turn the privacy mode off and then back on in order to get the camera to turn off. It just feels weird to have the camera on when I am at home - like anyone could be watching me:) We haven't had any pribalems yet with the treat launcher not working correctly. I love being able to keep an eye on my dog when I am gone.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Bait and Switch
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, the unit and concept are great. They had these on sale a few months ago, under the guise that the alerts (bark alert, person alert, activity, etc) were included. Now suddenly the app has been updated and that is a premium service. It's a "free trial" now, which means in the near future they are going to charge for something that was included when I purchased it. Very misleading, especially now that the return period has passed. Beware - the alerts will NOT be free in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Vet says NOT reliable!!!! Toss this device because it will not reliably toss treats.  Frustrating!
customer_reviews.text: Many times, Furbo will connect once and then stop!!! My dogs get so excited about one treat being tossed and then I try to toss a second treat and it will NOT connect. The instructions to reconnect are stupid!! You have to be at home to go through the steps to reconnect...unplug...wait 10 seconds and reconnect. The purpose of the app is to toss the treat remotely. I’m a veterinarian that wanted to be able to recommend this to my clients who work long hours but wanted to be able to provide their pets with a mid-day snack. I hope some other company develops a more reliable treat tossing device. I will then TOSS this device!
customer_reviews.author: Vikki the Vet

customer_reviews.title: Can't wrangle the unit after power-off
customer_reviews.text: Let me preface: I'm a software engineer. I'm not tech illiterate. Pros: Was decent while it lasted. It'd be nice to get pan & tilt for this price. Updating firmware was easy. Initial setup was okay. Cons: I unplugged it, because it was unsettling watching myself at home. However, when I plugged it back in, I can't get the thing to shows signs of life. I can't find it on Bluetooth to wrangle the POS. Powercycled phone & Bluetooth. It's just stuck in startup mode after a single ungraceful shutdown (there's no other way to turn the thing off besides yanking power).
customer_reviews.author: kb

customer_reviews.title: Astonishingly Bad
customer_reviews.text: Never have I paid $200 for an electronic device and let down so much. The companion app is one of the worst pieces of software I have ever used. Video fails to connect 80% of the time. The app is slow and has the clunkiest UI. Please invest in some good app developers. Until they improve their app, this thing is absolutely unusable. It's a shame because the 20% of the time it does work, it is quite useful. DO NOT RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: The Guy Who Bought This

customer_reviews.title: They now want to charge $7/month for the subscription fee
customer_reviews.text: Pretty unhappy they sprung this charge on us. $7/month is ridiculously high for such a basic service. Camera quality is pretty bad, microphone doesn't really work, app kind of sucks. Not sure I'd buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: some guy

customer_reviews.title: FEATURES ARENT FREE
customer_reviews.text: Loved this camera until they decided to charge for the features that were free when I purchased! The Furbo app sends you “bark alerts” and it used to record a short video of what was happening at the time of the bark. Now they don’t record a video - making this $200 camera basically worthless. I purchased this to monitor my dog that has separation anxiety. Its helpful to see how hes behaving when he’s home alone as we try to help him with his anxiety. I can’t always check the alert right away and relied on the cloud recordings to monitor my dog. I wish I could return this camera - WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! My dog sits by it, waiting for a treat. Makes a cute sound before dispensing and pretty decent picture quality on the camera! Bark alert works well, too. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Linda Garland

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing at best.
customer_reviews.text: Our Furbo stopped working five weeks after we received it. We tried all of the troubleshooting tips offered on their website. In addition, we emailed and chatted online with a Furbo representative. Fortunately, I had purchased an extended warranty with Square Trade, and was able to receive reimbursement for the faulty product. Sorry, cannot recommend Furbo.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Dustin

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS item!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this item! It alerts me when my dog is barking, I can take a look to see AND hear what’s going on. I can toss my fur baby treats, speak to him, listen in, and the range of vision is phenomenal! He has also come to know that when it makes the sound, a treat is coming to him. I’ve commended him and rewarded him for going potty on his training pads while I’m at work, I’ve given commands such as sit, down, etc, and rewarded him for following orders. It allows me to continuously watch and train him when I’m not even at home. WONDERFUL!!
customer_reviews.author: Special K

customer_reviews.title: So Frustrating...
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of Furbo, but it's unreliable and the point of having Furbo is to be able to communicate with your pet when you are NOT home. I connect to reliable wireless at work and have reliable wireless at home from my Samsung Galaxy 9S+ and it connects for 5 seconds then says I need to check internet connection or I need to lower the resolution of the video. I have checked all of the above over and over again. I will attempt to contact service and see if there's something I'm missing. If this continues to work so poorly I will be returning the product, unfortunately!
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Fur-no
customer_reviews.text: Rarely would I give anything 1 star but here it is absolutely warranted. After setting up, I got it to work once. Since then, I have had no luck connecting to it via the app. (Do note that the app has an aggregate of 2.8 stars on the App Store) I have gone through the troubleshooting instructions with no luck. What’s more infuriating is that even after notifying me that set up is unsuccessful, I still manage to get assailed by notifications of my dogs’ every noise forcing me to turn off all functionality out of sheer exhaustion.
customer_reviews.author: Dust Blaze

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great
customer_reviews.text: It's an awesome gadget and my pups love it. The only criticism as that it should hold more treats comparatively to what it dispenses. I feel like I'm constantly having to refill. It would also be cool if there were a way to change up the 'Pavlovian tune'. My pups knew what was coming after only the third attempt. It'd be fun to throw them off. LOL
customer_reviews.author: FeitclubTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: One issue away from being perfect....
customer_reviews.text: Every feature has worked great for us on the Furbo. The video, night cam etc.... The only drawback i wanted to note, that i didn't see in other reviews is that the Privacy mode (turning the furbo off when you're home) is only activated by bluetooth, meaning your phone needs to be within about 6 feet of the furbo for it to know you're phone. I really wish it was GPS activated as i find myself always turning on my bluetooth so my phone isn't blowing up (by the bark notifications) while i am home, and then i forget to turn it off when i leave and its draining my cell battery.
customer_reviews.author: Cain

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera based on the smart alert features not realizing that in order to have these "smart alerts," I would need to pay a monthly subscription to the "dog nanny" to ensure that my pet is safe at home. Without the subscription, all you get is the "barking alert." Which is great but don't advertise the other alerts without telling buyers that they are only able to get these features with a monthly subscription to the "dog nanny."
customer_reviews.author: Andrea D'Ambrosio

customer_reviews.title: Bad video quality and malfunctioning treat tosser- FURBO NOT recommended
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device to keep an eye on my pups while away from home. First thing I noticed was the horrible video quality (720p). The minimum should be 1080p resolution for such device, but that was my fault for not reading the specs first. Second, was the tosser. It stopped launching treats after a short amount of time (not covered by warranty anymore) so no i'm stuck with a huge camera. I do NOT recommend this product- I suggest you purchase a regular 2 way camera with better video quality for a lot less.
customer_reviews.author: Harry S Sohn

customer_reviews.title: Expensive Paper Weight
customer_reviews.text: It is a great idea in theory but not well executed. I have had this product just over a year and gone through 3 different units. The first unit arrive unable to launch treats. The second unit would not stay connected to the WiFi and now I am having the same problem with the third unit. Even after unplugging from the power source and doing hard resets, the unit will only stay connected for less than a day and I have to the process all over again. From my perspective it is now just an expensive paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: Hailee J Damp

customer_reviews.title: Dreadfully disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This thing didn’t work at all. The app is really horrible. Read the reviews! Customer service is extremely slack and unhelpful. This is a big waste of money. Wait for the next generation or some other product that actually does what it says it’s going to do. Buyers beware. This thing is unreliable and does not do what it says it will do. It’s almost a joke created by a team of apathetic ill experienced developers trying to make a buck (or a lot of bucks) Big thumbs down.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for all dog owners!
customer_reviews.text: Loves this!!!! cant say enough good things about the Furbo. The wide angle camera makes this little guy a great addition to the home for a little extra surveillance amongst watching over the little ones. Plus it doesn't look tacky. The voice feature is pretty handy as well. Responsive notifications are mind easing alerts. Recommend adjusting to a lower setting. The default is a bit too sensitive. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Neil Cardinez

customer_reviews.title: Slightly obsessed with the Furbo
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been eyeing this for months and finally made the purchase. I am obsessed with it. Ironically, it’s supposed to help ease pets’ separation anxiety, but I think it’s making my separation anxiety worse 😭 I get notified any time my dog walks by (notifications can be adjusted), and it just makes me miss him more when I’m not home! 🥰 It was super easy to set up, and it works well. You do have to buy a specific sized treat, but the app provides several recommendations. I’ve also connected it to my Alexa, so I can give my dog treats easily at home, too! Absolutely love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Good yet heartbreaking
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. My dog just loves it. But only when I’m home. My dog suffers from severe separation anxiety. I had no idea that when I leave the house she just cries and cries and sits at the door waiting for me to come home. There are times I almost wish I hadn’t gotten it so I don’t know she’s just crying. When I toss a treat to her she won’t eat it. But when I come home she won’t sit with me. Just sits in front of Furbo. But I still feel like it’s a great product
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: WARNING - UPDATE AFTER 1.5 Years!!!! Doesn't Work.
customer_reviews.text: WARNING- After 16 months of occasional use (when I went on work trips), the treat launch mechanism is completely broken and it no longer works. Furbo only has a 1-year warranty for direct sales. In concept, I love this camera and treat dispenser, but reality it ALWAYS had connection issues. It works about 50% of the time. Definitely NOT worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: KBTTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Dog nanny Huge unwanted invasion of privacy
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE of dog nanny. This “free” app for a month records dog activity in room where Furbo. Mine is in bedroom as dog often sits on my bed while I’m gone. I didn’t check nanny videos for some time. As I clicked on them there is my dog moving about and me coming out of bathroom bare NAKED after shower. HUGE INVASION of privacy. Videos delete after 24 hours but only if you’ve looked at it. So angry and couldn’t delete app without chatting online with Furbo. Before dog nanny I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing and I use it every day. I have a mischievous Shar Pei and a Pitbull and it's really fun to creep on them and throw them treats throughout the day. This will be great when travelling, too. There are alerts for people being in your home, dogs being active, barking, and even smoke alarms. It tattled on our dog last week when I got an active alert, popped in and caught her in the process of pulling a pizza box off the table to have a snack. It was hilarious to see her confusion and "guilty dance" at hearing my voice. It's definitely not a necessity, but it's fun to have.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Lillian

customer_reviews.title: The comfort solution for pets and their parents.
customer_reviews.text: . My dogs love it.. I can talk to them, the bark alert notification alerts remind me to check in, since my dogs do not bark often, the treat dispenser is a plus. This photo was actually taken by the furbo unit and viewed via the app. Wish I would have purchased a while ago. My little are rescues and experience anxiety when we leave for work. Perfect solution .
customer_reviews.author: Charisse Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best Pet Product Around!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far, my favorite pet product to date. Yes, it's spendy, but well worth it! I bought this because my dog was having seizures and I couldn't keep track of them for my vet while I was at work - now that her seizures are treated, I love to just watch her anytime I'm not home. I have a small Pomeranian and a Tabby Cat - who I can see them both with this camera. I like that it tells me via a notification that my dog is barking - then I can tell her to stop. I love watching them, talking to them and giving her treats from work! Plus, the night vision works very well!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared....
customer_reviews.text: Be prepared to buy a new one every 12 months. That's when they seem to break and then it's not covered by the warranty any longer. But Furbo will offer to replace it for half price with a refurbished piece of junk, which is what I did the first time, and that one broke, too. Finally gave up on the Furbo and went with an off brand treat camera tosser.
customer_reviews.author: JLB

customer_reviews.title: Free monitoring service no longer free
customer_reviews.text: This used to be a wonderful product but they just rolled out an update where they are now taking away free Nanny cam services that were part of the service when I bought this expensive toy. Get ready for service fees if you're buying this because they just added them, 3 months after I paid 130$ for it.
customer_reviews.author: VJC

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: Everytime we go out with friends or go to work we constantly worry what our pup obie is doing. We are worried about if he's getting into stuff, or just going rogue in our apartment. This completely eliminates this and when we do see him getting into stuff, we can big brother voice call our dog to stop. It has been so helpful and amazing. Also, my husband and I just get a kick out of throwing the treats to our dog while we are gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product/prepare to pay subscription
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera and the idea, picture quality is very good, alerts are nice and the ability to talk to my loves while I’m at work is awesome. I guess I did not pay attention to the fact that the features are only a trial, you do have to sign up for a subscription and for whatever reason they never have the ability for you to pay monthly... oddly enough you are welcome to pay the yearly and above! So yes, you’ll get scammed into the more hefty charge but at least the product is good
customer_reviews.author: Christina Gregoroff

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for anxious dog moms and dads!
customer_reviews.text: Loooooove this! Best $200 I’ve ever spent! The peace of mind I get to just check in on my dog and see that she is indeed just sleeping on the couch is worth the price alone! I don’t really use the microphone feature because I feel like that might creep her out if she hears my voice and I’m not there... but I love checking in on her and throwing her treats!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Heerdt

customer_reviews.title: This was amazing the two first weeks i had it
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing the two first weeks i had it. You get to see your pets when at work. You get to throw them a treat. But after 2 weeks the treat dispenser broke. So that was a bummer. App crashes a lot, and often freezes my iphone for coupIe of minutes which is annoying. I still use it to check on them but its not as "exciting" as it was when i initally got it. I also get notification on my phone when my dogs start barking which is cool.
customer_reviews.author: dragica

customer_reviews.title: Premium?  You ought to know...
customer_reviews.text: All of the things you use to rationalize buying this camera at this price include: Text when dog active, text when dog barks, text when human present, etc., are only include “for now”. Shortly a lot of these features will be part of a premium app that you’ll have to pay separately for. I’m returning it, but a camera with a lenses that swivels and also has two way Wi-Fi auidio for 1/3 of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality camera let's us check in on the pup. Unlike other cameras we have had, this one does not emit any sound.Others made some sort of dog can only hear sound. She would go nuts trying to find the sound whenever we checked in. This is NOT the case with this one. We attempted to use it for training. We are trying to get her over being home alone. We are able to check in with the camera,send treats if she is being quiet and use the microphone to give her praise. Now she gets excited as soon as she sees it come out.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I unpackaged the Furbo and followed the instructions for setup. Furbo wouldn’t complete setup. I tired a couple of times before contacting their customer service- which is a chat forum. No phone number to call. Someone with bad English walked me through various steps and instructions...which all seemed very much like stand on one foot and hop around in a circle. They really asked me to reset my WiFi, connect a hotspot, etc. Nothing worked. TLDR - Short story is Furbo didn’t work, help desk service was poor, I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very unreliable connectivity!!
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, VERY poor execution and even worse support!! Over a week to get a response from them after the first message sent to them through their app and after two weeks of waiting for a follow up response, I returned it. Said they knew they were having connectivity issues and were trying to resolve them. Sad because we loved it the few times we’d get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Klint Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Kids caught skipping school! Works better than advertised!!
customer_reviews.text: So far we are enjoying the Furbo. The kids...not so much! Our 12 year old was loyaly checking on the dog from school today and noticed the older children are home. The 17 yo and 15 yo are staying alone while we are out town. We startled them with our voices after seeing their beautiful faces on camera. BUSTED!!! My only advice is to buy A LOT of treats! The kids went through three treat bags on week 1!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jcbjlt

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am so upset.. my husband is so hard to buy for and I thought that he’d never guess this to be his Christmas gift although he had shown interest in having one for our dog. It arrived today and right on the outside of the box it says what it is😩. Horrible, I never expected that. So disappointed that he already knows the only thing I bought him. I don’t even know how well it works or not.. can’t write about that yet🙄
customer_reviews.author: Janie Summerlee

customer_reviews.title: Fired, but my dog is cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg this thing is amazing!!! It took a little bit for the speaker to start working for some reason, but this is the best purchase ever! All day now, at any point, I can look in and see what my adorable pup is doing, talk to him, and throw him a treat. I am constantly on it. So much that I got fired from my job and my wife is taking the kids and leaving me, but it is worth every penny! I give this a perft 5/7 and recommend any person with a pet get one!!
customer_reviews.author: Kacy Irby

customer_reviews.title: What a piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this since November, and the damn thing quit working after I washed it once. And I can't return it. It has only been 5 months and I can't return it. What gives?
customer_reviews.author: Amazonustomer 2469228ddhagags

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend for dogs who can be trained
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is above average. Live in California with floor to ceiling windows so expecting picture to be crisp but it felt like I was using an old web cam. I ultimately returned this because no amount of training could get my dog to respond to our voice. But that’s just my dog. The real reason for the loss of a star is because of the video quality, how loud and alarming the treat dispenser is, and how the only useful features would be paid if I kept this longer than thirty days.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly - returned
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this innovative product. Modern and clean design. Felt sturdy. App did not work. Product wouldn't connect to wifi. After the receiver of this gift wasted an evening on trying to get this to work, it was returned. Too bad. I bought an ip security camera instead to view the dog.
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Sold as “new”, but it was used.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. This item was sold as new but it was in fact used and registered to another user. I did not want to finish setting everything up in my home knowing that someone else would have access to this device.
customer_reviews.author: Bertha Villanueva-Shertzer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product - Don’t waste your $$
customer_reviews.text: If I could give 0 stars I would, Bought this product for my mother-in-law who recently passed. In order to reset it you need the previous owner to “unlock or release” it to you. You can factory reset but it keeps linking you back to the previous owners account who has to release you so it’s now a doorstop. We won’t go into the $90+ fee they want to charge you to operate it. I find it very interesting that I can factory reset my laptop, mobile phone and home security cameras but cannot reset a Dog Cam!!! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this for a year. Right off the bat I realized the treats would dry up immediately, and they did. So I stopped using that function within a month. Camera quality is not great. It's notification and detection system is terrible. After one year you have to pay a monthly subscription for it to continue doing its basic function. Now I only get notifications if my dog barks. By the time the app loads my dog has stopped barking. It won't tell me anymore if it notices humans or any other feature like cloud recording. Unless you pay their subscription. Not worth the full price.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy for 2 dogs
customer_reviews.text: I find it really annoying and unsafe that you can’t “scroll back” in the nanny feed. You can pay for the nanny cloud recording, but it only shows you snips of activities. I find that it’ll only pick up random activity, from hours before, and not the activity that I’m looking for (ex: one dog keeps peeing and I can’t scroll back to see whom). Also this doesn’t work well for two dogs at all. The treat throwing delay is too high. I regret buying this!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Worthless for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pet cam to use when we travel, and it isn't equipped to connect to hotel WiFi (EVERY hotel requires you to sign in). This lack of basic functionality makes the camera completely useless. I will be returning the camera ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Kinsey

customer_reviews.title: Furbo stopped working and won’t connect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in July of 2019 and by January of 2020 the unit stopped working. The light indicator remained white which means it cannot connect to WiFi. Customer service had me reset and then sent me a replacement unit. The replacement unit had the same issue. Now they want to send me another unit. They want me to keep the cord which may very well be part of the issue. If anyone has any advice please let me know. I’m DONE with Furbo at this point. I just want a refund but they aren’t offering that. While it was working it was great. If anyone knows how to correct this problem PLEASE let me know! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: lovegreatdeals

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for an animal lover
customer_reviews.text: I bought my furbo 2 months ago. I absolutely love it. Being able to watch my dog and cats while at work is so comforting. They love hearing my voice while I am gone and of course getting treats! My cat unfortunately knocked it off the dresser 2x and broke it. Customer service was fantastic! Responded to my inquiry and tried to troubleshoot. When nothing worked they sent me a new one. Can't say enough good things! Do not hesitate to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. The camera does not move! $200 and the camera lens is fixed in one position. Two way talk feature is not truly TWO WAY. I can hear my dog OR he can hear me, but we could not converse the way this thing markets itself. WiFi kept disconnecting for hours on end and it stressed me out not knowing how my puppy was coping with his separation anxiety while I was away at work. Get Lovoom!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Connectivity Issues
customer_reviews.text: The idea behind this is brilliant. I simply wished it would work. Despite wifi speeds at home and work being 100mpbs the video in the app will never load and gets stuck at 75%. I can turn the wifi off and use mobile data and then it will work half of the time. The only fix is to be on mobile data and close all your apps and make sure it's not open in the background before opening it. This probably eliminates the bark notification from working if you constantly needing to make sure the app isn't running in the background.
customer_reviews.author: J. Maehl

customer_reviews.title: It sucks, not reliable
customer_reviews.text: See that purple lite. Means it doesn't work anymore. It's a really expensive brick. DON'T BUT IT BECAUSE IT WILL STOP WORKING AND FURBO SUPPORT CAN DO NOTHING ONCE YOUR WARRANTY EXPIRES.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Cruddy product with cruddy support - 2020 review
customer_reviews.text: Bought it back in November of 2018, and my wife was thrilled. The video part still works fine, but the treat dispenser mechanism (which is really why you buy the thing) died in a little over a year. My wife then contacted support in March 2020, and got a replacement unit for about 60 dollars. It's since died, too. That second unit died back in May (it's now July) and furbo support hasn't responded to any of her requests. So ... If you want to spend over $100/year for this thing, go for it. But I'm looking for alternatives as the quality is subpar, and the support is seriously lacking.
customer_reviews.author: dimikagi

customer_reviews.title: Money Well Spent!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this for Christmas and absolutely loves it. Great picture/image. Receiving the notices such as dog barking, etc is a great safety feature. Only complaint is you cannot adjust the camera eye. In other words, her dogs are medium in size so she had to set it up on a TV stand to keep dogs from getting to it to eat all the treats out of it at one time. When it’s up on a 4-5 foot stand, you can’t aim the camera lens down. Instead you have to place a book or something under it so that the camera lens is pointing downward. Other than that, it’s an awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: DIF

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase on Amazon yet!! Do not wait - your pup will thank you
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase on Amazon yet!!! Seriously buy it don’t even wait. I feel connected to my pups even when I’m gone! Also has a nanny app I’m using for free for 30 days! Only 6.99 after that a month. Worth it. Do yourself a favor hahah and your pets. I made profiles for them to hahah. Amazing night vision camera. Bought another camera for them but didn’t like it and that one had like 8K reviews but this one is soooo much better! Love the sleek look as well. Perfection!! Literally considering buying another one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Ok camera but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to be able to see my fur babies when we are not home. The camera is wide angle so we get good coverage of the full area.. The camera is noise activated not motion activated so some times it misses recording events. The app is not very reliable. Sometimes the videos won't play and I had to remove and re-install. The treat throw is ok but doesn't really shot it far way. And the videos don't save unless you pay for the subscription. It's an ok product but honestly think it's over priced.
customer_reviews.author: wonderpassion

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Creepy but fun! It's hard to restrain myself from interrupting the dog's naptime while I'm at work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s great when it works.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it when it was working. It started having issues almost right away with the treat tosser. I even ordered th recommended treats. I called the customer service hotline on the box and went thru troubleshooting. Nothing helped so I sent it back to Furbo for a replacement. I have yet to hear anything back. I wish I had just sent it back to Amazon directly. It would have been replaced by now. I have no idea what the eta is. Nothing. I know it made it to the return address as I have a tracker on it. I just wish they would update me on the status. It’s been frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Koch

customer_reviews.title: I love my Furbo
customer_reviews.text: I have two toy poodles that suffer from separation anxiety. I originally bought the camera to monitor one of my dogs who broke his leg, so I could check in. I love this camera, the app is fast, and it sends you alerts when my dogs bark or howl. I can throw treats and speak to my dogs which distracts them from them howling. The app has an addition Nanny app that is an additional fee per month and will also record moments from the day and take selfies if your pet goes close to the camera. I rave about this camera. I used Pet Botanicals Training Treats. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Marie Shaw

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY FURBO .......
customer_reviews.text: My dog is special needs...She is paralyzed in her hind quarters do to 2 ruptured disks over a year ago. So when she was having an issue recently with the Furbo I was able to see my dog in discomfort , able to hear her whimper and cry when she moved allowing me to leave work go get her and bring her to the vet before more damage was done. 3 days of crate rest she's on the mend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about my Furbo and it does everything I want it to - see my dog, give her treats, talk to her, and it notifies me when she is barking or moving. One major drawback is the cord - it nroke easily. I contacted Furbo and they were not able to send me a replacement because they were out of stock. A regular USB will not work because the tip is longer for the Furbo. Now I have a $200 device that I cannot use because I don't have a cord. I would get a different brand in the future that is less expensive. It I not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.. Definitely should be better for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Treats get stuck (even recommended treats), the app is pretty glitchy, and the alert system is super touchy. Two of the main reasons i bought this instead of just a regular camera were the treat dispenser and the barking notifications. The treat dispenser sometimes works. Other times it just gets clogged. The barking alerts notify you of any sound basically. Even when i turned the sensitivity down. We leave music on for our dogs during the day and were constantly notified about barking, when we realized it was just the music. This product is ok, but the things that make it more than just a camera have a lot of issues 😣
customer_reviews.author: Kyrstin Sexton

customer_reviews.title: It stopped working and customer service sucks
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after 6 months! My furbo has not been working for the past 4 months and I talk to customer service every week and they just keep telling me to restart it and do the factory reset. Nothing works. They don’t even have a phone number to pick up! You can only chat with them and they are zero help. We got scammed out of our money
customer_reviews.author: Marjan Mahdjoubi

customer_reviews.title: Discover just how lazy your dog really is!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, being able to check up on my dogs while I’m at work is awesome. Only disappointing this was to discover my dogs sleep 100% of the time I’m away so I don’t get any updates or selfies while I’m gone. Still trying to find treats that work and don’t upset my dogs stomachs. Worth every penny though! Great picture quality (remember to take plastic film off lense!!) both day and night. Speaker and microphone work very well. Can take photos and short clips. The updates are great and I will definitely be subscribing for the full package after my trial period.
customer_reviews.author: goats run southTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s cool but it disconnects almost everyday and I can’t access it remotely. It’s says it’s connected to WiFi but doesn’t connect to my phone or record anything either. Which if I can’t use it, makes it useless. When it works it’s great. But more times than not I go to check on my dogs and the connection won’t go through. Update. I once again go to check on my animals and my camera has again disconnected or is having trouble connecting. Very frustrating for a $200 camera...
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY IT OR RECOMMEND IT!
customer_reviews.text: Customer service, a joke. Been waiting 2 days to hear from them. Usability, not sure been waiting on customer service to tell me what is wrong with it. This product is a joke, it would be easier and less time consuming to buy a used iPhone and teach my dog to answer a FaceTime call! DONT BUY IT OR RECOMMEND IT!
customer_reviews.author: derrick farley

customer_reviews.title: Annoying but okay
customer_reviews.text: Ellen got me.... it’s not the greatest and tears get stuck in it and sometimes don’t shoot out. My dogs love it and I get alerted everytime they bark. (Every minute) I’ve resorted to shutting it off a lot
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing video quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love Furbo! Set-up was quick and easy, and the video/audio quality is amazing -- way better than other pet cameras I've tried (yes, I've tried a few)! The wide angle lets me see the entire room at once. The app is perfect for checking up on our beloved pets when we're at work, traveling, waiting in line at the supermarket... basically any time :) It's worked perfectly everywhere I've tried it! The phone notifications for barking are a great feature and I love that it didn't require any set-up -- it started working automatically! The product is really well-made, and the sleek design fits right into our decor. Even our cat loves it!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: We love our Furbo!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS!! It works really well. The sound has a lag (my crappy wifi) but is not the best but who cares? I can now monitor my fur baby and ensure he’s safe and happy while I’m out of the house. My dog loves it too!! He loves his treat machine. UPDATE: Sill love my Furbo. Just a note about size of treat suggested by Furbo: Don’t buy the Nutro Crunchy Dog Treats as suggested by the manufacturer. They are too large and will not push out of the Furbo. However my dog still loves them, but they will not work in this machine.
customer_reviews.author: sld

customer_reviews.title: Too much money for a mediocre camera
customer_reviews.text: Most of the features you have to pay for. Connection is terrible and Alexa doesn’t work. Save your money and don’t buy this mediocre camera with poor audio, it’s not worth the money or frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Allen J McNamee

customer_reviews.title: It’s Ok
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy, not always real-time. Doesn’t come with or have compatible treats. Sometime when you “toss” a treat nothing come out despite being full. It’s fun but I do see the novelty wearing off and it will soon be collecting dust
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took my money now asking for more.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself as a Christmas gift. I was super thrilled when I first set it up but now a few months later I’m not as happy. It’s great to have especially with dogs with separation anxiety but it charges you for the features it’s suppose to have. For no additional cost you can use the two way audio, check in, throw treats and take pictures/video. To get access to doggie diaries, selfies and alerts when there’s a person you have to pay an extra monthly fee which I think it’s ridiculous. Looking back I should have went with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Berry

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well, and exactly as described, but my dog was scared by the voice and treat features. She would run away and stay away from her regular sleeping area for 20-30 minutes after I had called her name and dispensed a treat (even though we had first introduced her to both features while we were still with her, physically). Overall, I enjoyed watching my dog throughout the day with the camera and photo functions, but I didn't want to continue causing her alarm and stressing her out, so I ended up returning the Furbo, as I wouldn't be using the speaker and treats features going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Update.
customer_reviews.text: Had it for less than a year and it doesn’t work anymore. The camera constantly stopped working. I had to constantly take it in and out of the outlet because it would freeze. I got it to make me feel better when we were out of town. It constantly froze up. Trying to figure out how to return it. The directions to restart it also doesn’t work. The directions are not updated bc I don’t have the features they say restarts it. For the price, I’m greatly disappointed. Got in touch with customer service. They shipped me a new one immediately. I will say that their customer service is great. Hoping this one works.
customer_reviews.author: J. T. S.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 17 months
customer_reviews.text: The product worked great for about a year and a half then just stopped working one day. Dealing with customer service was frustrating because it’s chat only and we keep getting disconnected. Much more helpful if I can just call customer service but that is not an option. After working through all of the steps with customer service my furbo is still not working. Undecided on if I would repurchase because of this. It’s only 17 months old so disappointed that it’s not working already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Upcharge required to use as intended
customer_reviews.text: My dad lives for his dog and was over the moon about this gift. Unfortunately, the WiFi on it wouldn’t work once he left his house, so he could only use it while he was home??? My dad had to pay extra to update the software and use it as intended. Christmas present fail! And less than a month later, the food dispenser stopped working. Luckily, customer service has been excellent, but still, not ok that as is, the device is unable to serve its sole purpose: watching your dog when you AREN’T home. Very misleading.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: App is flakey, treat launcher isn’t great.
customer_reviews.text: The app freezes and only works 50% of the time. The Furbo dispensing mechanism is weak and gets clogged up with small treats. I am using Tricky Trainer treats and they get stuck in the launcher hole. Weak. I expected better for the price. Update: Found treats that don’t get stuck in the launcher. Use Tricky Trainer Crunchy, not the chewy treats. It does shoot out multiples (2 or 3 at a time) but they are small and don’t jam the launcher.
customer_reviews.author: J. Erceg

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. PROS: Good camera quality (720p). Your able to zoom. Has Night Vision Able to record your own sounds. The delay in sound/voice is pretty small (2-3 second delay) compared to other pet treat cameras.. Very wide field of view. Can see more of the room with this than any of the other pet treat cameras I've used. CONS: The initial setup was a little long (when connecting via bluetooth sometimes says it's not online.) Was fixed by restarting the app and unplug/ replug the camera. (Don't forget to wait for the green light) Would be nice if there was a button to play your recorded sounds. Smaller than I thought it would be but still great.
customer_reviews.author: MistahBlob

customer_reviews.title: Favorite 2018 Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has wanted some way to view her dog back at home for years, but we never felt like a product would be worth the money it costs-until now. Wow!!! Purchased our Furbo on a Cyber Monday special, and it was everybody’s favorite gift of 2018. Setup was extremely easy and we absolutely LOVE being able to keep watch on our little pups at home while we are away. Works great for speaking to them and giving them treats but by far our favorite feature is taking a peek at them and just seeing what they are doing :)
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Busness Practices!
customer_reviews.text: AWWWWWFUL BUSINESS! I bought this camera nearly 2 years ago and it was fantastic with all the great features. Out of nowhere , literally nowhere, they now tell me I have to pay monthly for these features I have already had for free for nearly 2 years! This is the most awful way to conduct business. Would you buy a car with power windows if you knew two years later it would cost extra to roll them down? This should be illegal. I wish I could get a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Maxx

product_meta.title: Furbo Dog Camera: Full HD Wifi Pet Camera with 2-Way-Audio, Treat Tossing, Night Vision and Barking Alerts, Designed for Dogs, Works with Amazon Alexa (As Seen On Paul O'Grady - For the Love of Dogs)
feature_bullets: 🐾 SEE -- 1080p Full HD Camera & Night Vision: With Full HD, 160º wide-angle, 4x zoom and night vision, you will be able to see your dog clearly day and night.
🐾 TALK -- Talk to your dog at home to calm him down and HEAR what he is doing thanks to 2-way-chat.
🐾 BARKING ALERT -- Furbo sends a push notification to your phone when t senses your dog barking. You'll always know whats going on at home.

🐾PLAY -- Fun Treat Tossing: Play remotely by tossing treats to your dogs via the free Furbo iOS/Android app. Fill Furbo with over 100 pieces of your dogs' favourite treats & play a game of catch. Recommended treat size: 1cm.

🐾 STABLE & FLEXIBLE -- Place Furbo anywhere and change places whenever you like. The slight downward angle of the camera lets you see everything even if Furbo is placed high on a shelf and out of your dog's reach.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars9,476 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
